document_data.name: ''Ring of Blessing''
document_data.mainbody: '''Ring of blessing''' was an [[enchanted]] [[ring]], that resembled a shiny [[gold]]en band, from the ancient city of [[Myth Drannor]].
document_data.Powers: The aptly named magic ring was enchanted to allow the wearer to cast the ''[[bless]]'' spell at will. The ring held five charges of the spell.
document_data.History: Before the [[Weeping War]], a ''ring of blessing'' was among the enchanted items used by the inhabitants of the City of Song. In [[1368 DR]], one of these rings could be found on the deepest levels of the [[Elven Catacombs]] underneath [[Castle Cormanthor]]. The ring was looted from ancient elven tombs by a band of [[orog]] marauders.
